labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Discord client does not allow multi-lingual search filters.
data.short_description: Search criteria missing multi-lingual support. Supposedly worked until recently.
data.steps_to_repro: - Change client language from English to Spanish - Attempt to use tiene/tienen (translation of "has"), no criteria shows up. - Select has: and attempt to type imagen (translation of image), Discord does not allow it.
